summary: This is a pump I built out of Dwemer parts.
descriptionHtml:
Pump Assembly - V1.1

This is a Modder's resource only. If you do not work in the Creation Kit do not download this mod. The ESP is only useful if you want to edit the model and/or cut/paste.

For Modders:
The ESP contains one fully assembled Calculon 3000 pump. These are designed by Farnsworth Inventions. They are powered by a modified internal Tesla Coil. Lore friendly? What can I say? Those Dwemer are smart folk. The voltage can be adjusted to regional requirements.The pump is located in Interiors.

The cell is aaaPumpAssembly. It is the size shown in the pics. Remember, it is not a single piece. To change it's scale, you'll have to resize every piece of it. The pics show you how to assemble one.

Cleaned w/TESVEdit

I don't need credit. Do what you will with it.
author: scm1893
